pr_title: Update exporter property names to reflect 0.9.0 release

timeline.bodyText: Maybe worth linking to the below section from here
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -89,45 +89,84 @@ behavior you may find.
 
 The following configuration properties are common to all exporters:
 
-| System property          | Environment variable     | Purpose                                                                                            |
-|--------------------------|--------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
-| otel.exporter            | OTEL_EXPORTER            | To select exporter e.g. `otlp,jaeger`. Defaults to `otlp`                                          |
+| System property | Environment variable | Purpose                                                                                                                                                 |
+|-----------------|----------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
+| otel.exporter   | OTEL_EXPORTER        | Exporter to be used, can be a comma-separated list to use multiple exporters. Currently does not support multiple metric exporters. Defaults to `otlp`. |

replies.bodyText:
is otlp_span supported?
I get
WARN io.opentelemetry.javaagent.tooling.TracerInstaller - No otlp_span span exporter found
using latest 0.9.0 release.
replies.author: malafeev

replies.bodyText:
@malafeev oh no, thanks for noticing this! I removed otlp_span and otlp_metric from doc for now until we get that fixed in next release.
@anuraaga I moved the OTLP doc up to the top of the list since it's the default.
replies.author: trask
